titles.title: A bill for the relief of Anton Dodaj, Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/5/2013--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Anton Dodaj, Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj.
